text: Pablo Cuevas was the three-time defending champion, but lost in the semifinals to Fabio Fognini. Fognini went on to win the title, defeating Nicolás Jarry in the final, 1–6, 6–1, 6–4. ==Seeds== The top four seeds receive a bye into the second round. ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ===Bottom half=== ==Qualifying== ===Seeds=== ===Qualifiers=== ===Qualifying draw=== ====First qualifier==== ====Second qualifier==== ====Third qualifier==== ====Fourth qualifier==== ==References== * Main draw * Qualifying draw Category:2018 Brasil Open
title: 2018 Brasil Open – Singles
